title: 2/3 BR, Renovated Cleveland Heights Cedar Lee, CWRU, UH and CCF
posting_body: Totally renovated 2/3 bedroom unit on 2nd floor of duplex.
Bedroom #3 is a tandem room accessed off Master bedroom (ideal for office, exercise room, etc.)
* KITCHEN: New maple cabinets, new sink and countertop.
Newer appliances including dishwasher, fridge, stove with exhaust vent to outside the unit.
* BATH: Renovated with whirlpool tub, ceramic tile walls, exhaust vent, pedestal sink.
* BEDROOMS: New ceiling fans, renovated closets.
* DINING ROOM:
Has window seat, built-in china cabinets, built-in storage drawers.
* LIVING ROOM:
Sunlit with operable wood-burning fireplace, small walk-in closet, built-in storage drawers, built-in cabinets and storage shelves.
* PORCH: Open-air sun porch off of living room with beautiful natural finish white oak deck.
* Period-appropriate design throughout with newer wallcoverings, light fixtures, blinds.
* Hardwood floors throughout the unit (refinished white oak).
* Laundry and large secured storage locker in basement.
* Furnace is new 90+ high-efficiency gas unit.
* Garage space for one car.
* Just off Lee Road in the great Cedar-Lee neighborhood. 1-5 minute walk to:
* Cleveland Heights Library (main branch)
* Cedar-Lee Movie Theater
* Cain Park (summer/fall outdoor music amphitheater)
* Restaurants and bars including: Kensington Tavern, Voodoo Brewery, Boss Dog Brewery, Marotta's, Dewey's Pizza, Tavern Company, Stone Oven, etc.
* Services including: CVS drugstore, Zagara's Grocery, yoga studio, etc.
*5 Minute drive to Cedar/Fairmount, Coventry/Mayfield, Cedar/Warrensville retail and restaurants.
* Utilities: Resident pays for sub-metered electric and natural gas (each floor has its own gas hot water tank and high-efficiency gas furnace).
* Must see to appreciate.
* Email for more info or to arrange a tour.
